sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs"> <x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <definition>Services and activities related to the organization, management, and oversight of SPAWARSYSCOM and Echelon III OPSEC Programs, ensuring DoD, DON, Command and IG requirements are met. Research Technology Protection (RTP) Lead. Direct support to CDR SPAWAR for the DON RTP WG Exec Steering Committee. Provide assistance to Acquisition Programs for development of CPI and PPP's.</definition> <number>GWBS0001542</number> <parent_task/> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-25 15:59:56</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7f158176db91a3008e9357935e9619c6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-25 16:36:04</sys_updated_on> <task_code>5.1.8.2</task_code> <task_name>5.1.8.2 Operational Security (OPSEC)</task_name> <task_title>Operational Security (OPSEC)</task_title> </x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs> </record_update>
